field.p:
Dear: {organization}
I hope this message finds you well. I would like to take this opportunity to thank you for choosing Primus Auditing Ops to conduct your third-party audits. The purpose of my email is to inform you that the certificate with number {registry_number} is about to expire, and we would like to begin the Certification process.
We are interested in working with you, so it is necessary for you to contact us to schedule your audit. Please remember that scheduling in advance gives us the opportunity to assign the dates you propose.
I remain attentive to any questions and thank you in advance for your support.
Accept Decline
Best Regards.
"If you have already established contact with your coordinator, please disregard this email."
